question: Will a nuclear weapon detonate by June 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a nuclear weapon detonates anywhere in the world between January 30, 2023, and June 30, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET (inclusive). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

For the purpose of this market's resolution, any detonation of a nuclear weapon anywhere on the planet Earth will be sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution. This includes offensive usages, nuclear tests, and accidental detonations. Use/launch of a nuclear weapon that fails to detonate, a fake weapon that never detonates, or a dirty bomb that distributes radioactive material by means of a conventional explosion are not sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution of this market. Only a successful nuclear detonation will result in a "Yes" resolution. 

This market may resolve to "Yes" as soon as a nuclear detonation is confirmed by a preponderance of credible reporting. 

For the purpose of this market's resolution, determination as to whether a detonation was nuclear will be made by a preponderance of credible reporting.

events.title: Will a nuclear weapon detonate by...?
events.description: This is a market series over by when there will be a nuclear detonation anywhere in the world.

question: Daytona 500: Will Denny Hamlin or Ryan Blaney claim the pole position?
description:
The 2023 Daytona 500 is a NASCAR Cup Series race scheduled for February 19, 2023, at Daytona International Speedway in Daytona Beach, Florida, USA.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if either Denny Hamlin or Ryan Blaney wins the pole position in the 2023 Daytona 500. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the 2023 Daytona 500 is cancelled or rescheduled until after April 19, 2023, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from NASCAR (e.g. https://www.nascar.com/) including live footage of the race, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will USDC redemption or minting be halted in the U.S. by April 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if USD Coin (USDC) redemption or minting is halted in the United States between February 15 and April 30, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Redemption or minting must be halted by the resolution date for this market to resolve to "Yes." An announcement that redemption or minting will be halted, but goes into effect after the resolution date, will not suffice to resolve this market "Yes."

The primary resolution source for this market will be statements released by Circle (e.g. via https://www.circle.com/) and/or statements released by the federal government of the United States, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will OpenAI release GPT-4 by May 31?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if OpenAI makes GPT-4 available to users as a generally available public release (including any beta or test versions) by May 31, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise this question will resolve to “No”.

GPT-4 refers to a product that is explicitly named GPT-4, or is a successor to GPT-3 in the way that GPT-3 was a successor to GPT-2; it cannot be branded as GPT3.5 or a version of GPT-3.

Closed beta or a non-public release will not suffice to resolve this market to "Yes."

The primary resolution source for this market will be the official OpenAI website (https://openai.com/), however a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

question: Will $ETH be above $1700 on February 24?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT titled 2023/02/24 12:00 in the ET timezone (referring to 12:00 PM ET) has a final “Close” price of 1700.01 or higher, or to “No” otherwise.

The resolution source for this market is https://www.binance.com, specifically the ETH/USDT “Close” prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT?_from=markets&theme=dark&type=spot with “1m” and “Original” selected on the top bar.

To see the “Close” prices, mouse over particular candles and look at the value after “Close:” at the top of the chart. The API url https://api.binance.com/api/v3/klines?symbol=ETHUSDT&interval=1m with relevant startDate and endDate parameters may be used in the event that the chart is unavailable.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will Bing suspend its AI chatbot by February 28?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Bing shuts down or suspends its AI chatbot function by February 28, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Any suspension of Bing's AI chatbot function will result in this market automatically resolving to "Yes", regardless of the length of the suspension (outages due to high load will not count). Note: the AI chatbot is currently available to early access users - the chatbot must be suspended for those users for this market to resolve to "Yes" (suspension for only new invitees/people on the waitlist will not suffice to resolve this market to "Yes.").

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information Microsoft and/or Bing, however a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

question: NBA All-Star Game: Team Giannis vs. Team Lebron
description:
In the upcoming NBA All-Star Game, scheduled for February 19, 8:00 PM ET:

If Team Giannis wins, the market will resolve to “Team Giannis”.

If Team LeBron wins, the market will resolve to “Team LeBron”.

If this game is not completed by April 19, 2023 (11:59:59 PM ET), or is definitively cancelled before that date, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: 2023 Qatar Open Final: Swiatek vs. Pegula
description:
The 2023 Qatar ExxonMobil Open is a professional tennis tournament being held at Khalifa International Tennis and Squash Complex in Doha, Qatar.

This market will resolve to "Swiatek" if Iga Swiatek wins the final, or to "Pegula" if Jessica Pegula wins the final.

If a winner to this match is not determined by March 18, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Qatar ExxonMobil Open (ex: https://www.qatartennis.org/) including live footage, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Bryce Young be first QB selected in the 2023 NFL draft?
description:
If Bryce Young is the first quarterback selected in the National Football League's (NFL's) 2023 draft, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If no quarterbacks are drafted, the market will resolve to "No."

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NFL, or announcements from specific NFL teams, however a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

question: Will $MATIC be above $1.50 on February 25?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Binance 1 minute candle for MATIC/USDT titled 2023/02/25 12:00 in the ET timezone (referring to 12:00 PM ET) has a final “Close” price of 1.5001 or higher. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is https://www.binance.com, specifically the MATIC/USDT “Close” prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/MATIC_USDT?_from=markets&theme=dark&type=spot with “1m” and “Original” selected on the top bar.

To see the “Close” prices, mouse over particular candles and look at the value after “Close:” at the top of the chart.

The API url https://api.binance.com/api/v3/klines?symbol=MATICUSDT&interval=1m with relevant startDate and endDate parameters may be used in the event that the chart is unavailable. Please note, this market is about the price according to Binance MATIC/USDT; information from other sources or spot markets have no bearing on this market's resolution.
